verses.verse: וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> after שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard סַנְבַלַּ֗ט <WH5571> But it came to pass that when Sanballat כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <WH587> we בוֹנִים֙ <WH1129> that we builded אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> the wall וַיִּ֣חַר <WH2734> he was wroth ל֔וֹ וַיִּכְעַ֖ס <WH3707> indignation הַרְבֵּ֑ה <WH7235> and took great וַיַּלְעֵ֖ג <WH3932> and mocked עַל־ <WH5921> and הַיְּהוּדִֽים׃ <WH3064> the Jews

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> And he spake לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֶחָ֗יו <WH251> his brethren וְחֵיל֙ <WH2426> army שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said מָ֛ה <WH4100> What הַיְּהוּדִ֥ים <WH3064> Jews הָאֲמֵלָלִ֖ים <WH537> these feeble עֹשִׂ֑ים <WH6213> What do הֲיַעַזְב֨וּ <WH5800> commit self לָהֶ֤ם <WH1992> they הֲיִזְבָּ֙חוּ֙ <WH2076> themselves? will they sacrifice הַיְכַלּ֣וּ <WH3615> ? will they make an end בַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> age הַיְחַיּ֧וּ <WH2421> keep leave אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲבָנִ֛ים <WH68> the stones מֵעֲרֵמ֥וֹת <WH6194> out of the heaps הֶעָפָ֖ר <WH6083> of the rubbish וְהֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> even שְׂרוּפֽוֹת׃ <WH8313> which are burned

וְטוֹבִיָּ֥ה <WH2900> Now Tobiah הָעַמֹּנִ֖י <WH5984> the Ammonite אֶצְל֑וֹ <WH681> [was] by him וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and he said גַּ֚ם <WH1571> Even אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what הֵ֣ם <WH1992> they בּוֹנִ֔ים <WH1129> Even that which they build אִם־ <WH518> should יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> go up שׁוּעָ֔ל <WH7776> if a fox וּפָרַ֖ץ <WH6555> he shall even break down חוֹמַ֥ת <WH2346> wall אַבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH68> their stone פ

שְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> Hear אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> O our God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> how הָיִ֣ינוּ <WH1961> become בוּזָ֔ה <WH939> for we are despised וְהָשֵׁ֥ב <WH7725> and turn חֶרְפָּתָ֖ם <WH2781> their reproach אֶל־ <WH413> on רֹאשָׁ֑ם <WH7218> upon their own head וּתְנֵ֥ם <WH5414> and give לְבִזָּ֖ה <WH961> them for a prey בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land שִׁבְיָֽה׃ <WH7633> of captivity

וְאַל־ <WH408> not תְּכַס֙ <WH3680> And cover עַל־ <WH5921> and עֲוֹנָ֔ם <WH5771> not their iniquity וְחַטָּאתָ֖ם <WH2403> and let not their sin מִלְּפָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> from before אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּמָּחֶ֑ה <WH4229> be blotted out כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הִכְעִ֖יסוּ <WH3707> thee for they have provoked [thee] to anger לְנֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> about הַבּוֹנִֽים׃ <WH1129> before the builders

וַנִּבְנֶה֙ <WH1129> So built אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> we the wall וַתִּקָּשֵׁ֥ר <WH7194> was joined together כָּל־ <WH3605> and the whole הַחוֹמָ֖ה <WH2346> and all the wall עַד־ <WH5704> against חֶצְיָ֑הּ <WH2677> unto the half וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> had לֵ֦ב <WH3820> had a mind לָעָ֖ם <WH5971> thereof for the people לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> to work פ

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become כַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard סַנְבַלַּ֡ט <WH5571> But it came to pass [that] when Sanballat וְ֠טוֹבִיָּה <WH2900> and Tobiah וְהָעַרְבִ֨ים <WH6163> and the Arabians וְהָעַמֹּנִ֜ים <WH5984> and the Ammonites וְהָאַשְׁדּוֹדִ֗ים <WH796> and the Ashdodites כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָלְתָ֤ה <WH5927> went אֲרוּכָה֙ <WH724> the repair לְחֹמ֣וֹת <WH2346> that the walls יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem כִּי־ <WH3588> for הֵחֵ֥לּוּ <WH2490> began הַפְּרֻצִ֖ים <WH6555> [and] that the breaches לְהִסָּתֵ֑ם <WH5640> to be stopped וַיִּ֥חַר <WH2734> wroth לָהֶ֖ם מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> then they were very

וַיִּקְשְׁר֤וּ <WH7194> And conspired כֻלָּם֙ <WH3605> All יַחְדָּ֔ו <WH3162> all of them together לָב֖וֹא <WH935> to come לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <WH3898> [and] to fight בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem וְלַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> cause ל֖וֹ תּוֹעָֽה׃ <WH8442> A disturbance

וַנִּתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <WH6419> Nevertheless we made our prayer אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> unto our God וַנַּעֲמִ֨יד <WH5975> and set מִשְׁמָ֧ר <WH4929> a watch עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> and because יוֹמָ֥ם <WH3119> against them day וָלַ֖יְלָה <WH3915> and night מִפְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> because

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> And Judah כָּשַׁל֙ <WH3782> is decayed כֹּ֣חַ <WH3581> The strength הַסַּבָּ֔ל <WH5449> of the bearers of burdens וְהֶעָפָ֖ר <WH6083> rubbish הַרְבֵּ֑ה <WH7235> and [there is] much וַאֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <WH587> ourselves לֹ֣א <WH3808> are not נוּכַ֔ל <WH3201> so that we are not able לִבְנ֖וֹת <WH1129> to build בַּחוֹמָֽה׃ <WH2346> the wall

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> said צָרֵ֗ינוּ <WH6862> And our adversaries לֹ֤א <WH3808> They will not יֵדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> They shall not know וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or יִרְא֔וּ <WH7200> neither see עַ֛ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after נָב֥וֹא <WH935> till we come אֶל־ <WH413> in תּוֹכָ֖ם <WH8432> in the midst וַהֲרַגְנ֑וּם <WH2026> them and slay וְהִשְׁבַּ֖תְנוּ <WH7673> to cease אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> them and cause the work

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> where בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> came הַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <WH3064> And it came to pass that when the Jews הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> which dwelt אֶצְלָ֑ם <WH681> by them וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <WH559> they said לָ֙נוּ֙ עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> unto us ten פְּעָמִ֔ים <WH6471> times מִכָּל־ <WH3605> every הַמְּקֹמ֖וֹת <WH4725> From all places אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> where תָּשׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> whence ye shall return עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> against

וָֽאַעֲמִ֞יד <WH5975> Therefore set מִֽתַּחְתִּיּ֧וֹת <WH8482> I in the lower לַמָּק֛וֹם <WH4725> places מֵאַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> behind לַחוֹמָ֖ה <WH2346> the wall [בַּצְּחִחִיִּים כ] (בַּצְּחִיחִ֑ים <WH6708> higher place ק) וָֽאַעֲמִ֤יד <WH5975> I even set אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָם֙ <WH5971> the people לְמִשְׁפָּח֔וֹת <WH4940> after their families עִם־ <WH5973> with חַרְבֹתֵיהֶ֛ם <WH2719> with their swords רָמְחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH7420> their spears וְקַשְּׁתֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH7198> and their bows

וָאֵ֣רֶא <WH7200> And I looked וָאָק֗וּם <WH6965> and rose up וָאֹמַ֞ר <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to הַחֹרִ֤ים <WH2715> unto the nobles וְאֶל־ <WH413> about הַסְּגָנִים֙ <WH5461> and to the rulers וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to יֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> and to the rest הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְא֖וּ <WH3372> Be not ye afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> of them אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדֹנָ֞י <WH136> the Lord הַגָּד֤וֹל <WH1419> [which is] great וְהַנּוֹרָא֙ <WH3372> and terrible זְכֹ֔רוּ <WH2142> remember וְהִֽלָּחֲמ֗וּ <WH3898> and fight עַל־ <WH5921> for אֲחֵיכֶם֙ <WH251> for your brethren בְּנֵיכֶ֣ם <WH1121> your sons וּבְנֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1323> and your daughters נְשֵׁיכֶ֖ם <WH802> your wives וּבָתֵּיכֶֽם׃ <WH1004> and your houses פ

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after שָׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> heard אוֹיְבֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH341> And it came to pass when our enemies כִּי־ <WH3588> that it was נ֣וֹדַֽע <WH3045> that it was known לָ֔נוּ וַיָּ֥פֶר <WH6565> to nought הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> unto us and God אֶת־ <WH853> עֲצָתָ֑ם <WH6098> their counsel [וַנָּשׁוּב כ] (וַנָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> break ק) כֻּלָּ֙נוּ֙ <WH3605> all אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> all of us to the wall אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every one אֶל־ <WH413> to his מְלַאכְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4399> unto his work

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become מִן־ <WH4480> that הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it came to pass from that time הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he חֲצִ֣י <WH2677> forth [that] the half נְעָרַי֮ <WH5288> of my servants עֹשִׂ֣ים <WH6213> wrought בַּמְּלָאכָה֒ <WH4399> in the work וְחֶצְיָ֗ם <WH2677> and the other half מַחֲזִיקִים֙ <WH2388> of them held וְהָרְמָחִ֣ים <WH7420> both the spears הַמָּגִנִּ֔ים <WH4043> the shields וְהַקְּשָׁת֖וֹת <WH7198> and the bows וְהַשִּׁרְיֹנִ֑ים <WH8302> and the habergeons וְהַ֨שָּׂרִ֔ים <WH8269> and the rulers אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> [were] behind כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> all the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

הַבּוֹנִ֧ים <WH1129> They which builded בַּחוֹמָ֛ה <WH2346> on the wall וְהַנֹּשְׂאִ֥ים <WH5375> and they that bare בַּסֶּ֖בֶל <WH5447> burdens עֹמְשִׂ֑ים <WH6006> with those that laded בְּאַחַ֤ת <WH259> [every one] with one יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> of his hands עֹשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> wrought בַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> in the work וְאַחַ֖ת <WH259> and with the other מַחֲזֶ֥קֶת <WH2388> [hand] held הַשָּֽׁלַח׃ <WH7973> a weapon

וְהַ֨בּוֹנִ֔ים <WH1129> For the builders אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one חַרְבּ֛וֹ <WH2719> had his sword אֲסוּרִ֥ים <WH631> girded עַל־ <WH5921> at מָתְנָ֖יו <WH4975> by his side וּבוֹנִ֑ים <WH1129> and [so] builded וְהַתּוֹקֵ֥עַ <WH8628> And he that sounded בַּשּׁוֹפָ֖ר <WH7782> the trumpet אֶצְלִֽי׃ <WH681> [was] by me

וָאֹמַ֞ר <WH559> And I said אֶל־ <WH413> to הַחֹרִ֤ים <WH2715> unto the nobles וְאֶל־ <WH413> about הַסְּגָנִים֙ <WH5461> and to the rulers וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to יֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> and to the rest הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people הַמְּלָאכָ֥ה <WH4399> The work הַרְבֵּ֖ה <WH7235> [is] great וּרְחָבָ֑ה <WH7342> and large וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <WH587> we נִפְרָדִים֙ <WH6504> and we are separated עַל־ <WH5921> on הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> upon the wall רְחוֹקִ֖ים <WH7350> far from אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> one מֵאָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> another

בִּמְק֗וֹם <WH4725> In what place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whatever תִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> [therefore] ye hear אֶת־ <WH853> ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the sound הַשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <WH7782> of the trumpet שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> there תִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <WH6908> resort אֵלֵ֑ינוּ <WH413> about אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> ye thither unto us our God יִלָּ֥חֶם <WH3898> shall fight לָֽנוּ׃

וַאֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> we עֹשִׂ֣ים <WH6213> So we laboured בַּמְּלָאכָ֑ה <WH4399> in the work וְחֶצְיָ֗ם <WH2677> and half מַחֲזִיקִים֙ <WH2388> of them held בָּֽרְמָחִ֔ים <WH7420> the spears מֵעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> from the rising הַשַּׁ֔חַר <WH7837> of the morning עַ֖ד <WH5704> until צֵ֥את <WH3318> appeared הַכּוֹכָבִֽים׃ <WH3556> till the stars

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> also בָּעֵ֤ת <WH6256> Likewise at the same time הַהִיא֙ <WH1931> he אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> said לָעָ֔ם <WH5971> I unto the people אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> Let every one וְנַעֲר֔וֹ <WH5288> with his servant יָלִ֖ינוּ <WH3885> lodge בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> within יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> Jerusalem וְהָֽיוּ־ <WH1961> become לָ֧נוּ הַלַּ֛יְלָה <WH3915> that in the night מִשְׁמָ֖ר <WH4929> they may be a guard וְהַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> on the day מְלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> to us and labour

וְאֵ֨ין <WH369> neither אֲנִ֜י <WH589> I וְאַחַ֣י <WH251> So neither I nor my brethren וּנְעָרַ֗י <WH5288> nor my servants וְאַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH582> nor the men הַמִּשְׁמָר֙ <WH4929> of the guard אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אַחֲרַ֔י <WH310> which followed אֵין־ <WH369> nor אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> me none of us פֹשְׁטִ֖ים <WH6584> put off בְּגָדֵ֑ינוּ <WH899> our clothes אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> [saving that] every one שִׁלְח֥וֹ <WH7973> put them off הַמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> for washing ס
